description.en: This practical course enables students to understand the importance of communication in the workplace and as applied to the management of people. Through communication model analysis, students get to know the essence of communication, its goals and driving factors. Explained constructs and approaches are practically applied in three ways: (1) in-class practical exercises (e.g., business meeting simulation); (2) between-class written assignments (e.g., preparing a resume with a motivation letter); (3) in-class speaking assignments with between-class preparation (e.g., delivering speeches). Many of the tasks of this course call for students` cooperation and promote joint activities. To put the learned constructs and skills in context, two speakers from relevant companies operating in Estonia will be invited to talk about the application of communications to real-life business situations and share their experience with different communication formats and approaches.
description.et:
Praktiline kursus, mis selgitab kommunikatsiooni rolli organisatsiooni toimimises ja inimeste juhtimises. Kursusel selgitatakse kommunikatsiooni mudelit ning kommunikatsiooni eesmärke ja seda toetavaid ja takistavaid tefureid. 
Teoreetilisi kontseptsioone rakendatakse kursusel kolmel viisil (1) seminaries toimuvad praktilised ülesanded ja harjutused  (nt koosoleku simulatsioon); (2) kirjalikud kodutööd (nt motivatisoonikirja ja CV koostamine);  (3) seminaris toimuvad  esitlused. 

Kursusel kasutatavad harjutused ja ülesanded eeldavad üliõpilaste vahelist koostööd. Kursusele kaastakse ettevõtete esindajaid, kes jagavad isiklikke professionaalseid kogemusi ning avavad kommunikatsiooni rolli praktikas.

objectives.en: To introduce the basic principles and influencing factors of efficient communication on individual and organisational level and increase coping skills in the successful management of the communication process.
objectives.et: Tutvustada efektiivse suhtlemise põhialuseid ja mõjutegureid nii indiviidi kui ka organisatsiooni tasandil ja suurendada oma toimetulekuoskusi suhtlemisel.

grade_preconditions.et:
The course includes of 8 hours lectures and 18 hours of seminars. In order to pass the course student must attend 15 hours of class activities (including all in-class assignments: public speaking, resume / motivation letter feedback, business meeting simulation) - 5 class activities in total.
Submitting all home assignments (Please follow the deadlines; late submissions will not be graded!)
